revised_title: Comprehensive Analysis of the Schumann-Runge Band System
tldr: The authors conducted a comprehensive analysis of the Schumann-Runge band system in the emission spectrum of oxygen. They used a modified Loomis-Wood method to assign measurements to unambiguous transitions and derived a self-consistent set of molecular constants. This study improves our understanding of atmospheric opacity and has implications for synthetic spectrum applications in atmospheric physics and aeronomy.
